external_games.name: Descent: Road to Legend - The Delve

name: Descent: Road to Legend - The Delve
summary: The Delve is an adventure for 2-4 heroes in which you must explore and survive the realm of the Caretaker. Collect loot and gain skills as you advance through a collection of randomly selected stages. As you expand your Descent 2nd Edition collection, you unlock new maps, monsters, and boss fights.
